lines: To think that this was once nothing but a mountain of dirt and rubble. I daresay it might now be the most beautiful plaza in the area!
Ohl Deeh says the repair of Bahrr Lehs is already complete! I know I've only been here a short time, but I am truly impressed by the tenacity of man and moogle!
Before long we'll begin preparations for our work on Zenith proper. If Bahrr Lehs is anything to go by, I believe it's safe to say we'll have our work cut out for us!

obj.n: サカナ、ご期待ください
